remarks: Composition in the category of categories.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catcbas.c $e |- C = ( CatCat ` U ) $.
catcbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
catcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
catcco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
catcco.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
catcco.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
catcco.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
catcco.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X Func Y ) ) $.
catcco.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Y Func Z ) ) $.
catcco $p |- ( ph -> ( G ( <. X , Y >. .x. Z ) F ) = ( G o.func F ) ) $.
